title: Navigation button order pixel 4a/5
content:
I want to use pixel4a but i need the back button to be on the right side on navigation bar.

I cannot stand it on left and  don't want to be confused each time i press the wrong button.
The only solution i found is third party programs but they don't work properly and have ads.

Can you add this to a new update as others phones have to be able to choose which side the back button is otherwise i will have to return the pixel and find another phone as it bugs me to no end.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
